abstract: NBA players and owners will meet one last time to try to save the start of the 2011-2012 season; they can either broker a labor deal now or cancel regular-season games for second time in league history.
snippet: Negotiators agree that owners and players meeting Tuesday can either broker a labor deal now or cancel regular-season games for the second time in league history.
lead_paragraph: Negotiators agree that owners and players meeting Tuesday can either broker a labor deal now or cancel regular-season games for the second time in league history.

headline.main: Ready to Meet, With Start of N.B.A. Regular Season at Stake
headline.print_headline: Ready to Meet, With Start of N.B.A. Regular Season at Stake
headline.seo: N.B.A. Negotiators to Meet With Regular-Season Games at Stake
